review: The fire stick showed up on time and as always Amazons items are wrapped beautifully.  The only thing that was questionable and I think it has to do with knowing technology is the voice control. That seemed a little indifferent.

review: Was shipped fast. Easy set up. Fast scrolling through options.Remote works great. My only complaint is, every time we go to use it,it says no internet connection and I have to unplug it from the TV and back in for it to work...thats my reason for 4 stars.
author: UFO fan "billybob6702"
